Odessa.Ector County Correctional Center:
Ector County Correctional Center is a privately managed prison located in Odessa, Ector County, Texas, USA. It is housed on the second and third floors of the 1955 Ector County Courthouse at 301 N. Texas Street in Odessa.
The center was previously operated by Community Education Centers, one of seven CEC-managed facilities in Texas, under contract with three federal agencies: the United States Marshals Service, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement and the Federal Bureau of Prisons. Following an acquisition, the center is now ran by The GEO Warden Bryan LambertGroup.
